body.pretty: ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧(ran(c2)⊆ c0 ∧ ran(c2)≠ ∅ ∧ ran(c2)∈ Fin))→ ⋂ ran(c2)∈(fi ` c0))

comment: Sufficient condition for the intersection of the range of a function to be in the set of finite intersections. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Aug-2015.)
